text: Scots people aged 60-65 not received vaccine letter yet, call NHS on 0800 0308013 & select option #2 or 0300 790 6296.  There's currently a problem getting appointment letters to people in time.  I called today & my appt is Monday. Please RT #vaccine #VaccineRollout #COVID19 #NHS https://t.co/gUhiFgHCA4
